long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To transfer text from your computer to your mobile phone, you can use the Pc2Mobile extension.

Follow these simple steps:
➼ First, select the text you want to transfer and copy it using ctrl + c. 
➼ Then, click on the Pc2Mobile extension icon on your browser toolbar. 
➼ Next, use any QR code scanner app to scan the QR code that appears. You can also use Google Lens to scan the QR code. 

That's it! Your selected text will now be transferred to your mobile phone.
